original: Rāhulabhadra:
analyzed: rāhulabhadra

original: Prajñāpāramitāstotra
analyzed: prajñāpāramitā stotra

original: nirvikalpe namas tubhyaṃ prajñāpāramite 'mite /
analyzed: nirvikalpe namaḥ tubhyam prajñāpāramite amite

original: yā tvaṃ sarvānavadyāṅgi niravadyair nirīkṣyase // RahPps_1 //
analyzed: yā tvam sarva anavadya aṅgi niravadyaiḥ nirīkṣyase

original: ākāśam iva nirlepāṃ niṣprapañcāṃ nirakṣarām /
analyzed: ākāśam iva nirlepām niṣprapañcām nirakṣarām

original: yas tvāṃ paśyati bhāvena sa paśyati tathāgatam // RahPps_2 //
analyzed: yaḥ tvām paśyati bhāvena sa paśyati tathāgatam

original: tava cārye guṇāḍhyāyā buddhasya ca jagadguroḥ /
analyzed: tava ca ārye guṇāḍhyāyāḥ buddhasya ca jagadguroḥ

original: na paśyanty antaraṃ santaś candracandrikayor iva // RahPps_3 //
analyzed: na paśyanti antaram santaḥ candra candrikayoḥ iva

original: kṛpātmakāḥ prapadya tvāṃ buddhadharmapuraḥsarīm /
analyzed: kṛpā ātmakāḥ prapadya tvām buddha dharma puraḥsarīm

original: sukhenāyānti māhātmyam atulaṃ bhaktivatsale // RahPps_4 //
analyzed: sukhena āyānti māhātmyam atulam bhakti vatsale

original: sakṛd apy āśaye śuddhe yas tvāṃ vidhivad īkṣate /
analyzed: sakṛt api āśaye śuddhe yaḥ tvām vidhivat īkṣate

original: tenāpi niyataṃ siddhiḥ prāpyate 'moghadarśane // RahPps_5 //
analyzed: tena api niyatam siddhiḥ prāpyate amogha darśane

original: sarveṣām api vīrāṇāṃ parārthaniratātmanām /
analyzed: sarveṣām api vīrāṇām para artha nirata ātmanām

original: poṣikā janayitrī ca mātā tvam asi vatsalā // RahPps_6 //
analyzed: poṣikā janayitrī ca mātā tvam asi vatsalā

original: yad buddhā lokaguravaḥ putrās tava kṛpālavaḥ /
analyzed: yat buddhāḥ loka guravaḥ putrāḥ tava kṛpālavaḥ

original: tena tvam api kalyāṇi sarvasattvapitāmahī // RahPps_7 //
analyzed: tena tvam api kalyāṇi sarva sattva pitāmahī

original: sarvapāramitābhis tvaṃ nirmalābhir anindite /
analyzed: sarva pāramitābhiḥ tvam nirmalābhiḥ anindite

original: candralekheva tārābhir anuyātāsi sarvadā // RahPps_8 //
analyzed: candra lekhā iva tārābhiḥ anuyātā asi sarvadā

original: vineyaṃ janam āsādya tatra tatra tathāgataiḥ /
analyzed: vineyam janam āsādya tatra tatra tathāgataiḥ

original: bahurūpā tvam evaikā nānānāmabhir īḍyase // RahPps_9 //
analyzed: bahu rūpā tvam eva ekā nānā nāmabhiḥ īḍyase

original: prabhāṃ prāpyeva dīptāṃśor avaśyāyodabindavaḥ /
analyzed: prabhām prāpya iva dīpta aṃśoḥ avaśyāya uda bindavaḥ

original: tvāṃ prāpya pralayaṃ yānti doṣā vādāś ca vādinām // RahPps_10 //
analyzed: tvām prāpya pralayam yānti doṣāḥ vādāḥ ca vādinām

original: tvam eva trāsajananī bālānāṃ bhīmadarśanā /
analyzed: tvam eva trāsa jananī bālānām bhīma darśanā

original: āśvāsajananī cāsi viduṣāṃ saumyadarśanā // RahPps_11 //
analyzed: āśvāsa jananī ca asi viduṣām saumya darśanā

original: yasya tvayy apy abhiṣvaṅgas tvannāthasya na vidyate /
analyzed: yasya tvayi api abhiṣvaṅgaḥ tvad nāthasya na vidyate

original: tasyāmba katham anyatra rāgadveṣau bhaviṣyataḥ // RahPps_12 //
analyzed: tasya amba katham anyatra rāga dveṣau bhaviṣyataḥ

original: nāgacchasi kutaś cit tvaṃ na ca kva cana gacchasi /
analyzed: na āgacchasi kutas cit tvam na ca kva cana gacchasi

original: sthāneṣv api ca sarveṣu vidvadbhir nopalabhyase // RahPps_13 //
analyzed: sthāneṣu api ca sarveṣu vidvadbhiḥ nā upalabhyase

original: ye tvām evaṃ na paśyanti prapadyante ca bhāvataḥ /
analyzed: ye tvām evam na paśyanti prapadyante ca bhāvataḥ

original: prapadya ca vimucyante tad idaṃ mahad adbhutam // RahPps_14 //
analyzed: prapadya ca vimucyante tat idam mahat adbhutam

original: tvām eva badhyate paśyann apaśyann api badhyate /
analyzed: tvām eva badhyate paśyan a paśyan api badhyate

original: tvām eva mucyate paśyann apaśyann api mucyate // RahPps_15 //
analyzed: tvām eva mucyate paśyan a paśyan api mucyate

original: aho vismayanīyāsi gambhīrāsi yaśasvini /
analyzed: aho vismayanīyā asi gambhīrā asi yaśasvini

original: sudurbodhāsi māyeva dṛśyase na ca dṛśyase // RahPps_16 //
analyzed: su durbodhā asi māyā iva dṛśyase na ca dṛśyase

original: buddhaiḥ pratyekabuddhaiś ca śrāvakaiś ca niṣevitā /
analyzed: buddhaiḥ pratyekabuddhaiḥ ca śrāvakaiḥ ca niṣevitā

original: mārgas tvam ekā mokṣasya nāsty anya iti niścayaḥ // RahPps_17 //
analyzed: mārgaḥ tvam ekā mokṣasya nā asti anyaḥ iti niścayaḥ

original: vyavahāraṃ puraskṛtya prajñaptyarthaṃ śarīriṇām /
analyzed: vyavahāram puraskṛtya prajñapti artham śarīriṇām

original: kṛpayā lokanāthais tvam ucyase ca na cocyase // RahPps_18 //
analyzed: kṛpayā lokanāthaiḥ tvam ucyase ca na ca ucyase

original: śaktaḥ kas tvām iha stotuṃ nirnimittāṃ nirañjanām /
analyzed: śaktaḥ kaḥ tvām iha stotum nirnimittām nirañjanām

original: sarvavāgviśayātītāṃ yā tvaṃ kva cid aniśritā // RahPps_19 //
analyzed: sarva vāc viśaya atītām yā tvam kva cit a niśritā

original: saty evam api saṃvṛtyā vākpathair vayam īdṛśaiḥ /
analyzed: satī evam api saṃvṛtyā vākpathaiḥ vayam īdṛśaiḥ

original: tvām astutyām api satīṃ tuṣṭūṣantaḥ sunirvṛtāḥ // RahPps_20 //
analyzed: tvām a stutyām api satīm tuṣṭūṣantaḥ su nirvṛtāḥ

original: prajñāpāramitāṃ stutvā yan mayopacitaṃ śubham /
analyzed: prajñāpāramitām stutvā yat mayā upacitam śubham

original: tenāstv āśu jagat kṛtsnaṃ prajñāpāraparāyaṇam // RahPps_21 //
analyzed: tena astu āśu jagat kṛtsnam prajñā pāra parāyaṇam
